Text: Hmm... i really loved TTD in the past, let see what it is

Hame looks great but there is one "minus" that if possible need to be solved (i hope).
EVERYTHING IS VERY tiny when using resolution 1280-1024.
If possible to add more zoom or to made menu icons a little bigger.
It's really hard to look!

@myroslavmail 

Have a look at http://wiki.openttd.org/FAQ_troubleshooting#The_User_Interface_buttons_are_too_small

Check the NewGRF Settings 
Check Online Content 
Search for BigGUI
Download OpenGfx+ BigGUI
Add BigGUI to the Active NewGRF files
Great program, but did this really need to be torrented? It's available on their site for free...

@CreativeCommons
ok, thanks
Take a "plus" from me!
Great rebirth! :)
